name: EVERLUBE® 853
description: Everlube® 853 is a water-based, thermally-cured high temperature anti-gallant lubricant containing graphite with an inorganic binder. Everlube® 853 is designed to lubricate under high temperatures in aviation and propulsion applications. It is ideally suited for fasteners to provide enhanced torque-tension properties and also provides good durability for severe industrial environments. This product does not contain molybdenum disulfide, lead, heavy metals or antimony compounds.
